title: Teff Flatbread
directions: dd all ingredients into mixing bowl. Stir well with a whisk. Warm pan over medium to low heat. Add half of mixture to heated pan and cover with a lid. Let cook over medium heat for 6 to 7 minutes. This flatbread does not have to be flipped. Transfer onto plate and ready to use! Do the same with the rest of your batter and you have two full size flatbreads.
ingredients: 3/4 cup Teff Flour (you can get it here)
Salt (any seasoning: Pepper, Garlic, Dried Herbs, seeds, Etc.) to taste
